ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: The authors would like to acknowledge Jenish Patel and the entire NIAID TTIPO office for their support for this international project and the participants who volunteered their time to participate in this study. The authors would like to thank the clinical staff at h-VIVO for their dedication to the study procedures and Dr. Bryan Murray for his role as the medical monitor. This research was funded in part by the Intramural Research Program of the NIH, NIAID as well as a CRADA with SEEK. SEEK and the Intramural Research Program of NIAID.
